movie.title: Hurá
movie.description_intro: Mr. Paldan shares his life story during the communist government regime in Czechoslovakia during the 50s and 60s.
movie.description_full: Mr. Paldan shares his life story during the communist government regime in Czechoslovakia during the 50s and 60s.

movies.title: Banking on Africa: The Bitcoin Revolution
movies.title_english: Banking on Africa: The Bitcoin Revolution
movies.title_long: Banking on Africa: The Bitcoin Revolution (2020)
movies.summary: This documentary follows the journey of Bitcoin pioneers as the African continent seeks to leverage cryptocurrency to increase their independency from a banking system that fails them.
movies.description_full: This documentary follows the journey of Bitcoin pioneers as the African continent seeks to leverage cryptocurrency to increase their independency from a banking system that fails them.
movies.synopsis: This documentary follows the journey of Bitcoin pioneers as the African continent seeks to leverage cryptocurrency to increase their independency from a banking system that fails them.

movies.title: The Dream Is Alive
movies.summary: Shot in space by the astronauts themselves, the film provides a close-up look at several space shuttle missions, including the Challenger's 1984 mission to repair a damaged satellite.
movies.description_full: Shot in space by the astronauts themselves, the film provides a close-up look at several space shuttle missions, including the Challenger's 1984 mission to repair a damaged satellite.
movies.synopsis: Shot in space by the astronauts themselves, the film provides a close-up look at several space shuttle missions, including the Challenger's 1984 mission to repair a damaged satellite.

movies.title: Riding Giants
movies.summary: A semiserious, often rollicking, multigenerational insider's look at the origins of surfing, the colorful and subversive birth of surf culture, and the mythology and lure of the big wave. This passionate and fluid film is without question the first authentic history of surfing from its humble Hawaiian beginnings to the big business it became to the still-rebellious universe it inhabits today. Riding Giants is a study in individuality and freedom, the pursuit and techniques of pure kinetic pleasure, and the risk taking and attitudes that characterize its leading figures. For some viewers, this is perhaps more than they ever wanted to know. But Peralta's detailed knowledge of the surfing lifestyle, its icons and locations, its boom and exploitation by the media, and the fascination it has held for young men for more than five decades is unparalleled and fuels this expedition for the expert and initiate alike. Closely chronicling the sometimes-life-and-death drama that big-wave riding ...

movies.title: No Manifesto: A Film About Manic Street Preachers
movies.title_english: No Manifesto: A Film About Manic Street Preachers
movies.title_long: No Manifesto: A Film About Manic Street Preachers (2015)
movies.summary: In 1991, the Manic Street Preachers planned to sell 16 million copies of their debut and split up. Many years, many hits and one big mystery later, this colourful band and its fans appear in a unique documentary that tells their full story.
movies.description_full: In 1991, the Manic Street Preachers planned to sell 16 million copies of their debut and split up. Many years, many hits and one big mystery later, this colourful band and its fans appear in a unique documentary that tells their full story.
